comment: по клику на еретика, когда игрок устраивает диверсию

languages.text: "Only a little longer before this iron dolt is completely fried."

traits.locale_text: "Only a little longer before this iron numbskull is completely fried."
"Only a little longer before this iron numbskull is completely fried."
"Only a little longer before this iron numbskull is completely fried."
"Only a little longer before this iron numbskull is completely fried."
"Only a little longer before this iron dolt is completely fried."
"Only a little longer before this iron dolt is completely fried."

languages.text: "Nicht mehr lang, dann ist dieser eiserne Dummkopf vollständig geröstet."
languages.original_text: "Only a little longer before this iron dolt is completely fried."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht mehr lang, dann ist dieser eiserne Dummkopf vollständig geröstet."

languages.text: « Encore un peu, et cet imbécile sera complètement grillé. »
languages.original_text: "Only a little longer before this iron dolt is completely fried."

traits.locale_text: « Encore un peu, et cet imbécile sera complètement grillé. »

languages.text: “再过一小会儿，这个铁皮蠢蛋就要烧坏了。”
languages.original_text: "Only a little longer before this iron dolt is completely fried."

traits.locale_text: “再过一小会，这个铁皮蠢蛋就要烧坏了。”

languages.text: 「あと少しで、この鉄のでくのぼうもすっかり真っ黒焦げだね」
languages.original_text: "Only a little longer before this iron dolt is completely fried."

traits.locale_text: 「あと少しで、この鉄のでくのぼうもすっかり焼け焦げだね」

languages.text: «Solo un poco más antes de que este mendrugo de hierro esté completamente frito».
languages.original_text: "Only a little longer before this iron dolt is completely fried."

traits.locale_text: «Solo un poco más antes de que este cabeza hueca de hierro esté completamente frito».

languages.original_text: "Only a little longer before this iron dolt is completely fried."
